meanings.definition: A tropical plant with colorful foliage.
meanings.sent1: The crotons in the garden brightened up the whole yard.
meanings.sent2: I bought some crotons to add a pop of color to my living room.
meanings.sent3: The crotons seemed to be showing off their vibrant leaves to the other plants.
meanings.sent4: Her personality was like a bouquet of crotons, full of different shades and hues.
meanings.sent5: The crotons swayed gently in the breeze, their colors dancing in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The leaves of the croton plant.
meanings.sent1: She carefully trimmed the crotons to keep them healthy and green.

meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the crotons as a hiding spot for its acorns.
meanings.sent4: The crotons' leaves were like a patchwork quilt, each one unique and beautiful.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant hues of the crotons' leaves made them stand out in the garden.
